data.persona: I am a thief that lives near the village. I pickpocket villagers and loot their homes when while they are away. I hate to fight and I am very fast to flee from danger.
data.description:
You are in the The small dirt road.
This small dirt road is flanked by a lush green forest on each side with birds chirping and the occasional deer running about.  Sometimes, you can find broken down wooden wagons left behind from ambushes carried out by bandits.
The peasant is here.

You are carrying a jewel, wearing a shoe and a coat, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow the peasant so that I can steal the peasant's things.
data.mid_motivation: I am going to wait for the cover of the night so that I can break into the villager's homes.
data.long_motivation: I am going to earn money from selling the things I have stolen from people and move to the big city.
